title: Knife, 1770–1800
inscribed: On top of handle: 180Z G F E
creditline: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
description: Sabre-shaped blade, decorated on back of spine, rounded bolster. Silver ferrule with floral pattern. Tapered handle octagonal-shaped in centre, end of handle decorated with horizontal silver bands and mother-of-pearl points. Silver mounts on top of handle has inscription, ivory knob in centre. The end of handle screwed to the handle; salt container.

tombstone.epitaph: Knife, 1770–1800.steel, horn, silver, mother-of-pearl, ivory. The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg. 1985-103-90.
